name: Querysoft Open Runtime
short_description:
The QOR is a network of libraries providing a basis on which to build your application. 
It targets multiple devices, operating systems and toolchains. 
The aspect oriented design enables rapid migration to new platforms and maximises the reusability of features and components.
If you've always thought that the foundations of open source software could and should have been better designed, more open and more flexible then join the QOR team and get it fixed.
